com.deliveredtechnologies.rulebook.model.runner

Class AbstractRuleBookRunner

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.deliveredtechnologies.rulebook.model.Auditor
      • com.deliveredtechnologies.rulebook.model.runner.AbstractRuleBookRunner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RuleBook
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RuleBookRunner, RuleBookRunner4PojoClasses

    public abstract class AbstractRuleBookRunner
extends Auditor
implements RuleBook
    Declares an abstract class for creating RuleBookRunner derived classes using the template method pattern.
